  17. (* Low-level communication with the debuggee *)

  19. module Sp : sig
  20.   type t
  21.   val null : t
  22.   val base : t -> int -> t
  23.   val compare : t -> t -> int
  24. end

  26. ‌type pc =
  27.   { frag : int;
  28.     pos : int; }

  30. ‌val main_frag : int

  32. ‌type execution_summary =
  33.     Event
  34.   | Breakpoint
  35.   | Exited
  36.   | Trap_barrier
  37.   | Uncaught_exc
  38.   | Debug_info of Instruct.debug_event list array
  39.   | Code_loaded of int
  40.   | Code_unloaded of int

  42. ‌type report =
  43.   { rep_type : execution_summary;
  44.     rep_event_count : int64;
  45.     rep_stack_pointer : Sp.t;
  46.     rep_program_pointer : pc }

  48. ‌type checkpoint_report =
  49.     Checkpoint_done of int
  50.   | Checkpoint_failed

  52. ‌type follow_fork_mode =
  53.     Fork_child
  54.   | Fork_parent

  56. (* Set the current connection with the debuggee *)
  57. ‌val set_current_connection : Primitives.io_channel -> unit

  59. (* Put an event at given pc *)
  60. ‌val set_event : pc -> unit

  62. (* Put a breakpoint at given pc *)
  63. ‌val set_breakpoint : pc -> unit

  65. (* Remove breakpoint or event at given pc *)
  66. ‌val reset_instr : pc -> unit

  68. (* Create a new checkpoint (the current process forks). *)
  69. ‌val do_checkpoint : unit -> checkpoint_report

  71. (* Step N events. *)
  72. ‌val do_go : int64 -> report

  74. (* Tell given process to terminate *)
  75. ‌val stop :  Primitives.io_channel -> unit

  77. (* Tell given process to wait for its children *)
  78. ‌val wait_child : Primitives.io_channel -> unit

  80. (* Move to initial frame (that of current function). *)
  81. (* Return stack position and current pc *)
  82. ‌val initial_frame : unit -> Sp.t * pc
  83. ‌val set_initial_frame : unit -> unit

  85. (* Get the current frame position *)
  86. (* Return stack position and current pc *)
  87. ‌val get_frame : unit -> Sp.t * pc

  89. (* Set the current frame *)
  90. ‌val set_frame : Sp.t -> unit

  92. (* Move up one frame *)
  93. (* Return stack position and current pc.
  94.    If there's no frame above, return (null_sp, _).
  95.    The argument is the size of the current frame.
  96. *)
  97. ‌val up_frame : int -> Sp.t * pc

  99. (* Set the trap barrier to given stack position. *)
  100. ‌val set_trap_barrier : Sp.t -> unit

  102. (* Set whether the debugger follow the child or the parent process on fork *)
  103. ‌val fork_mode : follow_fork_mode ref
  104. ‌val update_follow_fork_mode : unit -> unit

  106. (* Handling of remote values *)

  108. exception Marshalling_error

  110. module Remote_value :
  111.   sig
  112.     type t

  114.     val repr : 'a -> t
  115.     val obj : t -> 'a
  116.     val is_block : t -> bool

  120.     val double_field : t -> int -> float
  121.     val double_array_tag : int
  122.     val same : t -> t -> bool

  124.     val of_int : int -> t

  126.     val local : int -> t
  127.     val from_environment : int -> t
  128.     val global : int -> t
  129.     val accu : unit -> t
  130.     val closure_code : t -> pc

  132.     (* Returns a hexadecimal representation of the remote address,
  133.        or [""] if the value is local. *)
  134.     val pointer : t -> string
  135.   end
